36  ros::NodeHandle n;
37  ros::ServiceClient client = n.serviceClient<mofs::FuzzyControl_IO>("flc");
38  mofs::FuzzyControl_IO srv;
39  srv.request.inputs[0] = 1.1;
40  srv.request.inputs[1] = 3.1;
41  srv.request.inputs[2] = 4.1;
42  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
43  while(ros::ok) {
44  if (client.call(srv))
45  {
46  ROS_INFO("Output controller: %f", srv.response.output);
47  }
48  else
49  {
50  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service mofs_controller");
51  return 1;
52  }
53  }

55
